heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Chance of a flurry. Steady or falling temperatures, from the upper 20s to mid 30s in the south, and from the low to mid 20s. Northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the far south.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. A rising chance of late-night snow showers in the north. Lows mainly in the upper teens to lower 20s, with low to mid teens northeast, and mid 20s in the broad valleys west. Winds light and variable.

heading: Thursday, Christmas Day
text: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers likely in the northern mountains, and in the valleys near the Vermont/Québec border, with 1 to 3 inches, scattered elsewhere from the Adirondacks and Route 4 northward, with a trace to 2 inches. Periods of blowing snow. Morning highs from the mid 20s to around 30 north, and upper 20s to mid 30s in the south. Winds becoming northwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph.
